title: Nimbus Cloak glitch on Ahri
body: Hey anyone else notice that nimbus cloak on Ahri will activate for no reason? It will just randomly go off when my ult is on cool down. Like it has happened when I walk back to lane, farming minions. It still works normally when I ult but will go off randomly at other times. It happens at least 1-2 times per game. Anyone else notice this?
